name: Tarzan Temple adventure runner
description:
Temple Adventurer Runner is a challenging, thrilling jump and run plat-former adventure!
Explore 5 different worlds and run through 100 smooth and colorful levels!
+ thrilling and fun running jungle temple adventure
+ frenzied, addicting and fast game experience
+ easy game to play with one-touch controls

Features of Temple Adventurer Runner 2017:
+ various challenges, 5 amazing, mysterious worlds and 100 running levels
+ beautiful, stunning and smooth graphics
+ great music and intense sound effects
+ exciting spirit of classic running platform adventures
+ easy and unique one-tap control game-play
+ very small APK file size to download in short time

Temple Adventurer is stranded in jungle ruin world. Help the hero running through jungle and temples and try to find all treasures.
Run for your life and escape all troubles and obstacles. Collect coins, explore different areas and run along cliffs, traps and barriers.
How far can YOU run? Can YOU beat the leader-board high scores? Test your treasure trapping skills now!

Enjoy this addictive mega adventure platformer running game hit! and share this game with your friends.

For Android game: https://play.google.com/store/search?q=alfonso2607
For iOS only Download at https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/temple-adventure-runner-2016/id1094834103?ls=1&m...

More android and Apple games at: http://vamoose-game.com
